scripts.clean:branches: git branch --merged | grep -v \* | xargs git branch -D
scripts.clean:pnpm: pnpm -r exec rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm clean
scripts.ts-prune: git clean -f -d -X packages/adapters/**/src && pnpm -r exec npx ts-prune src -e
scripts.ncu:minor: ncu -t minor -u && pnpm -r exec ncu -t minor -u -x rxjs,typescript,zone.js
scripts.ncu:patch: ncu -t patch -u && pnpm -r exec ncu -t patch -u
scripts.prepare: pnpm exec playwright install && echo "Don't forget to build all packages once: pnpm -r build"
scripts.update: pnpm ncu:patch && pnpm ncu:minor && pnpm ncu:major
